Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/Harrison
ShortDescription: 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Harrison, Sacramento, Roosevelt & California due to police activity nr California/Harrison

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Harrison, Sacramento, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on California due to police activity near California/Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.
